title: Web-Based Therapeutic Manual Training: Administrator Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic therapeutic manuals and workplace leadership experience
context.additional_context: A blended educational design supporting multimedia interactive learning in a smartphone-centric limited-technology environment.

learning_goals: Learners can explain core procedures of a treatment manual with 90% accuracy within four weeks
By the end of the six-month course, learners achieve 80% proficiency in applying treatment techniques through role-play simulations
Within one month after training, learners can utilize web-based treatment modules in real work environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
